mapper.insert: insert into supplier (supplier_name, contact_person, phone_number, address) values (#{supplierName}, #{contactPerson}, #{phoneNumber}, #{address})
mapper.update: update supplier set supplier_name = #{supplierName}, contact_person = #{contactPerson}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, address = #{address} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from supplier
and supplier_name like concat('%', #{supplierName}, '%') and contact_person like concat('%', #{contactPerson}, '%')
order by id asc
